rdf:Description.dc:title: artemis: articles, presentations, documents
rdf:Description.dc:creator: justin tung

ul.li: This independent research project entitled "Interval Analysis and its Applications to Optimization in Behavioural Ecology focuses on applying error approximation to a simple foraging model in behavioural ecology.

The "PDF Versions of the US Legal Code" project was done with a group of 5 programmers for Cornell's Legal Information Institute. It was aimed at extending the existing transformations from XML core legal code data to PDF

History of Rome (268) Essay (MS Word 2000)
Title: Women in Roman Politics during the First Half of the First Century BC

Asian Studies (208) Essay
Title: Influence of Political Goals on Gender Regulation in the Dutch East Indies during the 19th and 20th centuries
